title: Extension program helps producers improve their operations

tasks.task: Participating in a farm management and improvement program
subtasks: Working with family to continue operating Sturgeon Creek Farm since 1831
Running a cow-calf operation with commercial and registered Angus cows
Collaborating with the Jackson County Ag Extension agent to improve herd genetics
Managing forages, water, nutrients, wildlife, and timber for a holistic farm operation
Implementing rotational grazing and reducing hay feeding
Downsizing cow numbers from 125 to 50 at Happy Hollow Farm

tasks.task: Adhering to the management plan designed by the Ag Extension agent
subtasks: Conducting soil tests and following the program's recommendations
Utilizing nine pastures for rotational grazing at Happy Hollow Farm
Monitoring progress and adjusting strategies based on results
